title: Grand Portage National Monument: Places
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Places               Places         The Historic Gardener tends the kitchen gardens. NPS Photo / Mike Plummer-Steen  In the Historic Gardens varieties are grown which may have been grown at Grand Portage, posts westward into Canada and east to Fort Michilimackinac and Montreal. Read more about The Historic Gardens at Grand Portage National Monument in the link here or on the left side navigation.
